data.message:
When I try to contact you, NONE of the choices on the dropdown menu (PRODUCT or Problem category) are even close to my problem. I need to talk to someone in person.
I received a "no-reply" email from Facebook Payments informing me that someone opened an account in my name and it included my credit card number. But that was not me. So this is a security issue and i really need to talk to a real person .
